mapper.insert: insert into request (id, send_id, target_id, content, create_time, type, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update request set send_id = #{sendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, send_id, target_id, content, create_time, type, status from request
